page.title: 12Population
page.content: This block is divided into two areas.One of these areas is mainly farm land where the population is not very high.The other area has a growing population.The evidence of this is the new estates appearing around Manchester Road.The kind of people who live on these estates are Y.M.C.(young married couples).Not many old people live on these estates.The houses are to big and have stairs which old people can't manage.But now smaller houses and bungalows are being built for the older generation and people who cannot manage stairs or live alone. Over to the west of Manchester Road there are many old terranced houses,semi detatched houses,and a couple of ageing estates.Near the copice there are also two new estates being built.The new estates house about four people per house comfortably.
